name: caragenuni
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wi(wcel(c1, come), wss(c0, cdm(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ (c1 ∈ OutMeas → c0 ⊆ dom(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wi(wcel(c1, come), wss(c0, cdm(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c1)⊆ ⋃ c0)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ (c1 ∈ OutMeas → c0 ⊆ dom(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, come), wss(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c1)⊆ ⋃ c0)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0), wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0), wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)
⊣ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c1)∈ c0)
⊣ (⋃ dom(c1)∈ c0 → ⋃ dom(c1)⊆ ⋃ c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c1)∈ c0)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ ⋃ dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c1)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0), wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wceq(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(cdm(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)
⊣ (⋃ dom(c1)∈ c0 → ⋃ dom(c1)⊆ ⋃ c0)
⊣ ⋃ dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), c0), wss(cuni(cdm(c1)), cuni(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)
⊣ (⋃ dom(c1)∈ c0 → ⋃ dom(c1)⊆ ⋃ c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 = ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c1)

comment: The base set of the sigma-algebra generated by the Caratheodory's construction is the whole base set of the original outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
